https://registrar.umd.edu/graduation-dip: Diploma Services | Diploma Remake Request Request a new diploma by completing the Testudo [Diploma Remake Request](https://app.testudo.umd.edu/diplomaremake/). Replacement diplomas carry all information contained on the original except that all signatories will be current administrators.
